Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan Dried Gram-Negative MIC/Combo Panels with Imipenem (0.25-8 μg/mL)
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-negative bacilli
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Dried Gram-Negative MIC/Combo Panels with reformulated imipenem for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of gram-negative bacilli
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-negative bacilli, specifically for imipenem concentrations 0.25–8 μg/mL
